title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ₹6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 – 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours — eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We’re a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We’re looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You’ll work on real problems — from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines — while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You’ll Need:
 



 \\-0–3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges — we’d love to meet you.

title: Junior Engineer
description:
**About the Role** 




 Kick\\-start your career in a high\\-impact consulting environment. As a Junior Engineer/Consultant at AvancerPI Solutions, you’ll work across modern infrastructure and software stacks—spanning web/app development, IT services, automation, virtualization, cloud computing, app modernization, and workload migration. You’ll learn by building real solutions for real customers, alongside senior architects and consultants, using technologies like Nutanix HCI, VMware, open\\-source tooling, and the major hyperscalers.
 



  





 What You’ll Do
 


* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to Develop and implement technology solutions for customers.
* Contribute to the design, implementation, testing, and maintenance of software and automation components.
* Write clean, efficient, and testable code; participate in peer code reviews and adopt best practices.
* Troubleshoot issues, debug defects, and document fixes and runbooks.
* Learn new technologies quickly and apply them in customer projects and internal accelerators.
* Prepare clear technical documentation (how\\-tos, deployment guides, readme files).
* Support customer deployments and provide first\\-line technical assistance.
* Engage with clients to understand needs and assist in translating requirements into solutions.



  





**Tech You Might Work With** 



* IT Services / DevOps: Linux/Windows admin, CI/CD, Git, networking basics.
* Automation \\& Scripting: Python (preferred), Shell, Ruby, PowerShell, Go.
* Virtualization: Nutanix (AOS/AHV, Prism), VMware (vSphere/ESXi/NSX), Hyper\\-V.
* Cloud Computing: AWS / Azure / Google Cloud (compute, networking, IAM, storage).
* App Modernization: APIs, microservices, containers (Docker), Kubernetes basics.
* Workload Migration: IaC (Terraform/Ansible), lift\\-and\\-shift fundamentals, containerization.
* Web Development: HTML/CSS/JavaScript; React/Angular/Vue (one or more).
* App Development (optional): Java/Kotlin/Swift or cross\\-platform frameworks.
* Open\\-Source Solutions: Monitoring, logging, and tooling commonly used in modern stacks.



  





**What We’re Looking For** 



* Foundation in CS/IT/EEE or equivalent practical experience (projects, internships, certifications).
* Comfort with at least one programming language (Python/Java/JavaScript preferred).
* Good understanding of OS, networking, and cloud fundamentals.
* Curiosity, ownership, and ability to learn quickly in a customer\\-facing consulting setup.
* Excellent written and verbal communication; structured problem\\-solving.



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Hands\\-on labs or certifications (e.g., AWS Cloud Practitioner/Azure Fundamentals, Nutanix, VMware).
* Exposure to Terraform/Ansible, Docker/Kubernetes, or a modern front\\-end framework.
* Experience writing readme/runbooks, or contributing to open\\-source.



  





**What You’ll Gain** 



* Mentorship from senior Consultant/architects across virtualization, cloud, and automation.
* Real customer impact, rapid learning cycles, and a path to consultant/engineer roles in DC modernization, DR automation, CMP/self\\-service, and app platforms.
* Certifications support and performance\\-linked rewards.



  





**About AvancerPI** 




 At AvancerPI Solutions, we pride ourselves on being trusted advisors, delivering IT transformations with precision and innovation. Our focus is on achieving high availability, security, manageability, scalability, and simplicity in every solution we design. We approach every project with a consultative mindset, ensuring our software meets both technical and business requirements.

title: DevOps Engineer
job_function: Project Management, Engineering, and Information Technology
description:
At Wello Solutions, we help field service companies simplify operations and deliver better customer experiences. Our SaaS platform supports organizations in managing teams, optimizing performance, and scaling with confidence.
 



  





 We’re looking for a Senior Cloud DevOps Engineer to strengthen our cloud infrastructure, ensure reliability, and support our fast growth. If you’re passionate about automation, scalability, and system performance — this role is for you.
 



  





**Your Mission** 




  





 You’ll take ownership of building and maintaining a secure, scalable infrastructure on Microsoft Azure. Working closely with the CTO and senior engineers, you’ll ensure that our systems run smoothly and efficiently. Your focus will be on automation, reliability, and continuous improvement to deliver a seamless experience for our users.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 




  




* Design, build, and manage scalable cloud infrastructure in Azure.
* Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Bamboo and Bitbucket (or evaluate new tools).
* Standardize and automate deployment and release processes.
* Collaborate with development and QA teams to improve delivery and testing workflows.
* Implement strong observability practices using tools like Azure Monitor, Grafana, or Prometheus.
* Enforce security standards through automated testing and dependency checks.
* Lead incident response processes to quickly resolve issues and improve system resilience.
* Track system uptime, reliability, and performance to meet internal SLAs and business goals.



  





**What You Bring** 




  




* 5\\+ years of experience as a Cloud or DevOps Engineer in a SaaS environment.
* Strong hands\\-on experience with Microsoft Azure, Infrastructure as Code, and CI/CD automation.
* Good understanding of containers and orchestration tools.
* Proven experience with monitoring, alerting, and observability frameworks.
* Skilled in scripting (Python, Bash, or PowerShell).
* Knowledge of security testing and dependency management.
* Familiar with tools like JIRA, Confluence, SharePoint, and MS Teams.
* Strong communication and problem\\-solving skills.
* Master’s degree or equivalent experience.
* Fluent in English.



  





**Why Join Wello Solutions** 




  




* Be part of a growing SaaS company shaping the future of field service management.
* Work with modern cloud technologies and influence key technical decisions.
* Flexible, remote\\-friendly work environment focused on results.
* Competitive pay and professional growth opportunities.
* Supportive, collaborative team culture with real impact.



  





*Join us to build a reliable, automated, and scalable foundation for the next generation of field service technology.*
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and IT System Custom Software Development

title: Senior Software Engineer - Front End (8+ Years in developing Web Apps in React + Next JS + HTML/CSS/JS)
description:
**Sr Software Engineer (Front End Development \\-React), Assurant, GCC\\-India**
 We're looking for a highly skilled
 **Front\\-End Developer** 
 with strong experience in
 **React, Next.js** 
 , and modern front\\-end technologies. Your focus will be building performant, scalable, and accessible user interfaces. While not required, familiarity with
 **Optimizely CMS/Commerce** 
 or other headless CMS platforms is a bonus. You'll collaborate closely with designers, back\\-end developers, and digital strategists to deliver exceptional web experiences.
   

  

**This position will be in Bengaluru, Hyderabad \\& Chennai at our India location.**
**Work Time: 3:30 PM IST – 12:30 AM IST**
**What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?**
* Develop responsive, high\\-performance web applications using Next.js, React, and TypeScript.
* Implement server\\-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and incremental static regeneration (ISR) with Next.js.
* Build reusable UI components and design systems using Tailwind CSS, Styled Components, or CSS Modules.
* Integrate with APIs (REST/GraphQL) and headless CMS platforms like Optimizely.
* Work with UX/UI designers to transform wireframes into interactive experiences.
* Identify and address UI performance bottlenecks, ensuring fast loading times and smooth user interactions
* Write unit and integration tests using Jest, React Testing Library, or similar tools.
* Ensure UI functionality and aesthetics are consistent across various browsers and devices.
* Contribute technical documentation for front\\-end architecture, components, and best practices.
* Keep up\\-to\\-date with emerging front\\-end technologies, tools, and best practices, and advocate for their adoption where appropriate. Participate in code reviews, agile ceremonies, and continuous improvement.


**What are the requirements needed for this position?**
* Overall 8\\+ Years of experience in software engineering domain.
* 5\\+ years of front\\-end development experience with React.js.
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on Next.js experience in production environments.
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3/SASS.
* Experience with responsive design, cross\\-browser compatibility, and mobile\\-first development.
* Familiarity with API integration (REST, GraphQL) and state management.
* Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, Playwright).
* Understanding of CI/CD workflows, Git, and Agile development practices.
* Optimizely CMS Certification is huge plus. Knowledge of Angular is a plus.

title: Lead Software Engineer (10+ Years in DotNet Core + 10 Years in Any RDBMS + 2 Years in Mongo DB + 3 Years in Angular/React/Vue + Azure)
description:
**Lead Software Engineer, Assurant, GCC\\-India**
 A Lead Software Engineer is a key player in the development and maintenance of software systems, guiding the technical direction of projects, and guiding team members.
   

  

**This position will be in Hyderabad/Bangalore/Chennai at our India location.**
**Work Time: 3:30 PM IST \\- 12:30 AM IST**
**What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?**
* Technical Leadership


 Architectural Design: Design software architecture, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security. Code Quality: Enforce coding standards and best practices to ensure high\\-quality code. Technical Solutions: Provide technical solutions and troubleshoot issues that arise during development. Innovation: Keep abreast of new technologies and incorporate them into the team's work where appropriate.
   

  

* Development


 Coding: Write, review, and optimize code for critical software components. Testing: Oversee the development and execution of unit tests, integration tests, and automated testing. Deployment: Manage deployment processes, ensuring smooth releases and minimal downtime.
   

  

* Continuous Improvement


 Performance Optimization: Analyze and optimize software performance. Process Improvement: Continuously improve development processes to enhance productivity and quality. Feedback Incorporation: Collect and incorporate feedback from users and stakeholders to improve software products.
   

  

* Communication


 Stakeholder Interaction: Communicate effectively with stakeholders, including product managers, designers, and other engineers. Documentation: Ensure comprehensive documentation of software design, code, and processes.
   

  

* Project Management


 Planning: Participate in project planning, including defining scope, timelines, and resources. Coordination: Coordinate tasks among team members, ensuring project milestones are met. Risk Management: Identify potential risks and implement mitigation strategies. Progress Tracking: Monitor and report on the progress of projects to stakeholders.
   

  

* Team Leadership


 Mentorship: Mentor junior and mid\\-level engineers, providing guidance and support for their professional development. Collaboration: Foster a collaborative environment, facilitating effective communication within the team and with other departments. Conflict Resolution: Address and resolve any conflicts or issues within the team.
   

  

**What are the requirements needed for this position?**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent
* Proficiency in designing, implementing, and maintaining back\\-end APIs using one of the following programming languages: C\\#, Python, or Go, with a minimum of 10\\+ years of experience.
* 10\\+ years of experience with relational database management systems (RDBMS) such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or Microsoft SQL Server, and at least 2 years of experience using NoSQL/document databases (preferably MongoDB).
* Minimum of 2\\+ years of experience with one of the front\\-end technology stacks: Angular , React, or Vue.
* At least 3 years of experience with Azure Cloud Platform and containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
* Thorough understanding of object\\-oriented programming (OOP) concepts and design/architectural patterns for developing scalable and maintainable software.
* Strong problem\\-solving abilities and the capacity to collaborate effectively within a team environment.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the capability to mentor and provide guidance to junior developers.
* Adaptability to new technologies and a commitment to staying abreast of industry trends.
